title: References
text:
References

Khan, T. (2023). Designing Data Drive Digital Twin Systems. Workshop 9: European Conference on Ecological Modeling 2023. DOI: https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.8313904
Khan, T. (2017). DC Resistivity: Estimating pore moisture distribution and mapping permafrost content in Kaunertal, Austria. Department of Geosciences. Skidmore College.
Khan, T., Banitz, T., Golivets, M., Grimm, V., Groeneveld, J., Kühn, I., Taubert, F. (2022). Prototyping a Biodiversity Digital Twin. Helmholtz-UFZ Science Days 2022. DOI: https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.8079131
Morche, D., Baewert, H., Schuchardt, A., Faust, M., Weber, M., & Khan, T. (2019). Fluvial sediment transport in the proglacial Fagge river, Kaunertal, Austria. Geomorphology of Proglacial Systems (pp. 219-229). Springer, Cham.
Schreiber, D.(Gutachter: Hinneburg A. & Khan, T). (2021). Klassifizierung von okulomotorischen Ereignissen (Fixierungen und Sakkaden) in webcam-basierten Eye-Tracking. Bachelor Arbeit. Institut für Informatik, Martin-Luther-University.

title: Hej! 👋🏼
text:
Welcome to my webpage. Here, I bridge the realms of earth sciences, numerical modeling, backend technologies, web computation, and data science.
  
  


🌎 Academic Background: Geosciences and Physics (Undergraduate), Earth System Data Science and Remote Sensing (Graduate)
🔬 Research Enthusiast: Unraveling Earth’s secrets through numerical and statistical models
💻 Backend Devotee: Crafting robust and efficient systems
🌐 Web Wizard: Translating complex computations into user-friendly interfaces
📊 Data Whisperer: Transforming raw data into meaningful stories
👨🏻‍🏫 Knowledge Sharer: Giving workshops and courses on cool methods



📚 Currently delving into the depths of numerical and statistical modeling techniques to simulate Earth’s dynamic processes via Digital Twins.
🔧 Building sophisticated backend systems that power cutting-edge scientific applications ranging from ML/AI pipelines to dynamic Digital Twin wokflows.
🧮 Modeling complex systems using advances in science, statistics, and digital technologies.
🌐 Creating interactive web experiences that bring computational sense to the masses.
📈 Taming complex datasets to reveal patterns, trends, and insights that inspire change.




“Die ‘Blickfänger’ von der Saale, Aspekt Magazin, 15.09.2021
“Eyetracking für bessere Datenanalyse: Hallesches Startup in den Startlöchern” - Mitteldeutsche Zeitung, 19.08.2021
“Eyetracking per Webcam: Adsata hat Erfolg im Blick”- Startup-Mitteldeutschland, 16.02.2021
“Schau mir in die Augen” - Investitions- und Marketinggesellschaft Sachsen-Anhalt, 28.07.2021
Podcast: ”Finding My Community: Immigration and Tech” with Taimur Khan of Adsata | Educative Sessions




🌱 Open to collaborations on exciting projects at the intersection of earth systems, physics, and technology.
💬 Hit the mail button in the menu and feel free to reach out for discussions, brainstorming, or simply a virtual chat.
© Taimur Khan.
